explanation: The element defines the term 'Policy Number' used in the policy.
function: Identifies the unique identifier assigned to the insurance policy.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: Policy Number is a unique identifier assigned to a specific insurance policy.

intent_details.actor_obligations: Insurer must use this number to reference the policy in all communications and transactions.

explanation: The element defines the term 'Named Insured' as ABC Corporation, specifying who is covered under the policy.
function: Identifying the entity or individual that is the primary insured party under the policy.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element identifies ABC Corporation as the named insured on the insurance policy.

intent_details.what_is_covered: ABC Corporation as the insured party
intent_details.temporal_conditions: Applies for the duration of the policy term
intent_details.actor_obligations: ABC Corporation must comply with the terms and conditions of the policy

conditions.effect: Coverage applies only to ABC Corporation
conditions.consequence: Coverage does not apply if the named insured is not ABC Corporation

explanation: The element establishes the specific time period during which the policy is in effect, indicating the start and end dates.
function: Defines the duration of coverage provided by the insurance policy.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element defines the time period during which the insurance policy is in effect.

intent_details.temporal_conditions: The policy is effective from January 1, 2025, to January 1, 2026.

conditions.effect: Defines the time period during which the policy is in effect
conditions.consequence: Coverage only applies between the specified dates

explanation: This element specifies a specific monetary limit of $1,000,000 for each occurrence, which is a sub-limit within the broader coverage provided by the policy.
function: To establish the maximum amount of coverage available for each individual occurrence of a covered loss.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element sets the monetary limit of insurance coverage for each occurrence to $1,000,000.

trigger_events: Occurrence of an event triggering insurance coverage
intent_details.temporal_conditions: Coverage applies to each separate occurrence

conditions.effect: Limits the coverage to $1,000,000 per occurrence
conditions.consequence: Coverage is limited to $1,000,000 for each separate incident

text: This endorsement modifies insurance provided under the following: COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY COVERAGE PART
explanation: This endorsement modifies the coverage provided under the Commercial General Liability Coverage Part, indicating a condition that alters the scope of coverage.
function: To specify the changes or modifications to the insurance coverage provided under the Commercial General Liability Coverage Part.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element modifies the insurance coverage provided under the Commercial General Liability Coverage Part.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Insurance coverage provided under the Commercial General Liability Coverage Part

conditions.condition_text: This endorsement modifies insurance provided under the following: COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY COVERAGE PART
conditions.consequence: Coverage will only be provided as modified by this endorsement

text: SCHEDULE Name of Additional Insured Person(s) Or Organization(s): XYZ Partner Company
explanation: The element specifies the addition of XYZ Partner Company as an additional insured party, extending coverage to them. (Corrected invalid type)
function: To extend coverage to a specific entity beyond the named insured

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element designates XYZ Partner Company as an additional insured party under the insurance policy.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Liability coverage for XYZ Partner Company
intent_details.temporal_conditions: Coverage applies for the duration of the policy term
intent_details.spatial_conditions: Coverage applies wherever the policy is valid
intent_details.actor_obligations: XYZ Partner Company must meet any requirements specified in the policy for coverage to apply

conditions.condition_text: Name of Additional Insured Person(s) Or Organization(s): XYZ Partner Company
conditions.effect: Must be named as an additional insured for coverage to apply
conditions.consequence: Coverage will not apply if XYZ Partner Company is not named as an additional insured

text: Section II – Who Is An Insured is amended to include as an additional insured the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.
explanation: The element expands the coverage to include additional insured parties specified in the Schedule.
function: This element specifies that certain persons or organizations listed in the Schedule are considered insured under the policy.

references.explanation: The COVERAGE_GRANT element refers to the Definitions element by mentioning the additional insured person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element extends coverage to additional insured persons or organizations listed in the Schedule.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Additional insured persons or organizations listed in the Schedule
intent_details.temporal_conditions: Coverage applies as long as the additional insured status is in effect
intent_details.actor_obligations: The insurer must recognize the additional insured status as per the Schedule

conditions.condition_text: the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule
conditions.effect: Expands coverage to include additional insured parties
conditions.applies_to: Section II – Who Is An Insured
conditions.consequence: Coverage applies to the additional insured parties listed in the Schedule

text: We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies.
explanation: The element provides coverage for damages that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay due to bodily injury or property damage.
function: To specify the scope of coverage provided by the insurance policy in terms of liability for bodily injury or property damage.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: Promises to pay for covered damages or losses

conditions.condition_text: the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies
conditions.effect: Coverage only applies if the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages for bodily injury or property damage
conditions.consequence: Coverage is triggered when the insured is legally obligated to pay for bodily injury or property damage

text: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.
explanation: This element establishes a requirement for the insurer to defend the insured in case of a suit seeking damages.
function: Specifies the insurer's obligation to provide legal defense for the insured in certain situations.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: The insurance company has the right and duty to defend the insured in any legal action seeking damages.

intent_details.actor_obligations: The insurance company must defend the insured in such legal actions.

conditions.condition_text: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.
conditions.effect: Modifies coverage by specifying the insurer's duty to defend the insured in a lawsuit seeking damages
conditions.consequence: Coverage applies only if the insurer has the right and duty to defend the insured

text: However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance does not apply.
explanation: This element establishes a requirement for the insurer to defend the insured only for damages that fall within the scope of coverage provided by the policy.
function: Establishes the conditions under which the insurer is obligated to defend the insured in legal actions related to covered damages.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element states that the insurance company has no obligation to defend the insured in a lawsuit seeking damages for bodily injury or property damage that is not covered by the insurance policy.

trigger_events: 'Suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage'
intent_details.actor_obligations: The insurance company is not obligated to defend the insured in lawsuits for damages not covered by the policy.

conditions.effect: Removes coverage for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage'
conditions.applies_to: 'suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage'
conditions.consequence: No duty to defend the insured

text:
Expected or Intended Injury
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.
explanation: The element explicitly removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured.
function: To exclude coverage for situations where the insured intentionally causes bodily injury or property damage.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element excludes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured.

conditions.condition_text: "Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured
conditions.effect: Removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured
conditions.consequence: Coverage does not apply if bodily injury or property damage is expected or intended by the insured

text:
Contractual Liability
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.
explanation: The element explicitly removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage arising from contractual liability assumed by the insured.
function: Excludes coverage for liabilities assumed by the insured under contracts or agreements.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This exclusion pertains to bodily injury or property damage for which the insured is obligated to pay damages due to assuming liability in a contract or agreement.

trigger_events: Assumption of liability in a contract or agreement
intent_details.actor_obligations: The insured must be obligated to pay damages by reason of assuming liability in a contract or agreement for this exclusion to apply.

conditions.condition_text: "Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement
conditions.effect: Removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage resulting from assuming liability in a contract or agreement
conditions.consequence: Coverage is not provided for liabilities assumed in contracts or agreements

text: "Bodily injury" means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time.
explanation: The element provides a definition for the term 'Bodily injury' used in the policy.
function: To clarify and specify the scope of coverage related to bodily harm or injury to a person.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: Defines the term 'bodily injury' for interpreting policy coverage

intent_details.definition_impact: Influences interpretation of policy provisions using this term

conditions.condition_text: sickness or disease sustained by a person
conditions.consequence: Coverage is limited to bodily injury caused by sickness or disease sustained by a person

conditions.condition_text: death resulting from any of these at any time
conditions.consequence: Coverage is limited to bodily injury resulting in death at any time

text:
"Property damage" means:
a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property; or
b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.
explanation: The element provides a definition for the term 'Property damage' used in the policy.
function: To clarify the meaning of 'Property damage' for the purpose of the insurance policy.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element defines 'property damage' as physical injury to tangible property or loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Physical injury to tangible property or loss of use of tangible property

conditions.condition_text: Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property
conditions.effect: Must be met for coverage to apply
conditions.consequence: Coverage applies if physical injury to tangible property occurs

conditions.condition_text: Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured
conditions.consequence: Coverage applies only if there is loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured

text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate will not relieve us of our obligations under this policy.
explanation: This element establishes a requirement that the bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured will not relieve the insurer of its obligations under the policy.
function: To ensure that the insurer remains obligated to fulfill the terms of the policy even in the event of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: This element ensures that the insurance company's obligations under the policy will not be relieved in the event of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Obligations of the insurance company under the policy
intent_details.actor_obligations: The insurance company must fulfill its obligations under the policy regardless of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

conditions.condition_text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate
conditions.effect: Removes coverage in case of bankruptcy or insolvency
conditions.consequence: Will not relieve the insurer of their obligations

text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

conditions: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

explanation: This element establishes a requirement for the insured to notify the insurer of an 'occurrence' or offense that may result in a claim, indicating a reporting obligation.
function: To ensure timely reporting of potential claims to the insurer for proper handling and investigation.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: Policyholder must promptly notify the insurer of any potential claim arising from an occurrence or offense.

intent_details.temporal_conditions: Notification must be made as soon as practicable
intent_details.actor_obligations: Policyholder must notify the insurer promptly

conditions.condition_text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.
conditions.effect: Requirement for reporting claims or incidents
conditions.consequence: Coverage may be affected if not reported promptly
